meanings.definition: Ureases: enzymes that catalyze the hydrolysis of urea to ammonia and carbon dioxide.
meanings.sent1: The ureases in the soil help break down urea into ammonia and carbon dioxide.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study ureases to understand how they convert urea into ammonia and carbon dioxide.
meanings.sent3: The ureases at the party were busy turning urea into ammonia and carbon dioxide, making them the life of the soil!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity ureases through her artwork, transforming ordinary materials into beautiful masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The powerful ureases worked tirelessly, transforming urea into vital nutrients for the plants.
